# dataproductportal_data_product (Data Source)

Fetches a data product from the Data Product Portal.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "dataproductportal_data_product" "example" {
  id = "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001"
}
```

## Schema

- `id` (String) The unique identifier.

### Read-Only

- `about` (String) Extended information.
- `description` (String) The description.
- `domain_id` (String) The domain ID.
- `name` (String) The name.
- `namespace` (String) The namespace.
- `status` (String) The status.
- `type_id` (String) The type ID.
